question: What year did Apple enter the smartphone market?
answer:
Apple entered the smartphone market in **2007**.

**Source:** [https://www.history.com/news/apple-smartphone-launch](https://www.history.com/news/apple-smartphone-launch)

While there’s some debate about the exact date, Apple officially launched the iPhone in October 2007.  It was a significant and initially controversial move, but it marked their entry into the competitive smartphone market.

**Note:** While Apple launched the iPhone, they initially focused on the iPod market and didn’t initially have a smartphone strategy.  The transition to smartphones was a gradual process, beginning in 2007.
